text: Yeah, basically need to wrap those fields and fix them because of the way it is programmed
I tried for about 20 minutes to make one that was a little bit smaller/simpler and said ehh, this works very well lol

We need to add the ability to have 2 or 3 custom fields for the author profiles in the blog. This way we can stuff different information into them or use one of them as a "Title" field for the authors company title.
